overview: After a wild Las Vegas bachelor party, Tracey's (Kaylani Lei) best friend, John, winds up in jail. Being a good friend, she gets in her car (with her ex) and takes a roadtrip to bail him out. Once out of jail, the insanity really starts - including trying to get his wedding ring back from an angry stripper - and getting him to the aisle on time! Fun and sexy - The Ring will leave you screaming, "I Do!"
tagline: They did, over and over again...
title: The Ring
